author: bergmeister
body: In new PRs from me and even @SteveL-MSFT (see e.g. [here](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/5495)) , the `license/cla` check is hanging in status `Waiting for status to be reported`

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: Sent an email to the owners, but being the weekend...

comments.author: jeffwilcox
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT if you have any particular users whose contributions you would like to accept now being hit by this, e-mail their aliases and the pull requests, and we can perform a manual data source check for right now, letting you override as needed

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @jeffwilcox would like my PR to be approved by the CLA bot https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/5495

comments.author: jeffwilcox
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT that one has been validated now

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body:
@jeffwilcox thanks!

For anyone with open PRs affected by this, please close and reopen them.

comments.author: bergmeister
comments.body: Thanks. I re-opened the PRs and it worked :-). As far as I have seen there are no other PRs left.

title: license/cla check in PRs stopped working
